# aggregate data for prime numbers below powers of 2
# previously used for some stuff that was removed

# hardcoded number of primes below powers of 2
PTLENS = {
    4:2,
    8:4,
    16:6,
    32:11,
    64:18,
    128:31,
    256:54,
    512:97,
    1024:172,

    8388608:564163,
    16777216:1077871,

    268435456:14630843,
    536870912:28192750,
    1073741824:54400028,
    2147483648:105097565,
    4294967296:203280221
}

# hardcoded product of primes below powers of 2 (modulo 2^61-1)
